response: data privacy is an essential aspect that needs to be prioritized. protecting personal information from unauthorized access and usage is crucial to ensure safe online interaction. governments across the world have come up with laws and regulations to safeguard individual's private information. the european union has implemented the general data protection regulation (gdpr) in 2018, which stipulates how user data should be handled. companies need to be transparent regarding data collection, storage and processing. individuals have the right to access their own data at any given time, request for deletion or rectification.
